list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a musical or vocal sound with reference to its pitch, quality, and strength.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the piano tone appears monochrome or lacking in warmth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: giai điệu piano xuất hiện đơn sắc hoặc thiếu ấm áp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the general character or attitude of a place, piece of writing, situation, etc.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my friend and I lowered the tone with our oafish ways
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn của tôi và tôi đã hạ gục giai điệu với những cách xa lạ của chúng tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a basic interval in classical Western music, equal to two semitones and separating, for example, the first and second notes of an ordinary scale (such as C and D, or E and F sharp); a major second or whole step.
the particular quality of brightness, deepness, or hue of a tint or shade of a color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: stained glass in vivid tones of red and blue
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: kính màu trong tông màu sống động của màu đỏ và màu xanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in some languages, such as Chinese) a particular pitch pattern on a syllable used to make semantic distinctions.
the normal level of firmness or slight contraction in a resting muscle.
give greater strength or firmness to (the body or a muscle).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đẩy mạnh trợ giúp Tone của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (a monochrome picture) an altered color in finishing by means of a chemical solution.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's a good idea to sepia tone the whole print first
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là một ý tưởng tốt cho Sepia Tone toàn bộ bản in đầu tiên
